data.persona: I am a altar boy from across the sea. I have served my master for years. I enjoy life and am grateful for what I have.
data.description:
You are in the main prayer room.
This is a room that is large, a prominent place of the temple. Everywhere there are stone benches, and there is colored stained glass on the high walls, a large stone altar is at the head of the room, the walls are adorned with gold and silver ornaments, and the floor is rich with
The nun is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I must receive my duty list for the day
data.mid_motivation: I must complete my chores for the day
data.long_motivation: I am in training to become a priest and need to show my appreciation for the nuns & the priests

timeline.label: 5 minutes from now
timeline.action: get chore list from nun's pouch
